definition: a breed of horse/variant of 歡|欢[huan1]

sentences.english: A man from China died after his three day gaming binge.
sentences.chinese: 一名中国男子在三天三夜的游戏狂欢之后，死掉了。

sentences.english: Well have some fun when the clock strikes one.
sentences.chinese: 我们要在钟敲一点时狂欢。

sentences.english: And what do those visiting Karneval dress up as? Everything imaginable.
sentences.chinese: 看看这些科隆狂欢节参与者的打扮，发挥你的想象吧。

sentences.english: Dancing shakes, his voice is high, the carnival night is yours.
sentences.chinese: 舞姿摇摇，嗓门高高，狂欢夜任你逍遥。

sentences.english: She would also have "mad" binges, and eat nothing but rice cakes and butter.
sentences.chinese: 她还有“疯狂的”狂欢，只吃大米蛋糕和黄油。

sentences.english: The Boxer episode is commonly portrayed in the West as an orgy of anti-foreign violence.
sentences.chinese: 在西方，义和团被视作反西方的暴力狂欢。

sentences.english: Bret : These movies were indebted to the carnival and the freak show.
sentences.chinese: 此类电影应该算是得益于狂欢节及怪诞异常的表演。

sentences.english: Brazil's carnival spirit has flagged of late.
sentences.chinese: 巴西的狂欢心情最近有所减弱。

sentences.english: Trades that sat in opposition to the orgy of money printing by the Fed.
sentences.chinese: 针对美联储印钞狂欢进行的逆向交易值得一提。

sentences.english: They heard this morning that they had passed the examination, so they went out to paint the town red.
sentences.chinese: 今天上午他们得知考试及格，于是都出去狂欢一场。

sentences.english: The night sky with colorful Band gorgeous, the crowd flocked to the carnival.
sentences.chinese: 夜晚，同乐坊的天空五彩斑斓，狂欢的人群络绎不绝。

sentences.english: The revels broke up at midnight.
Free libations , holiday revelers, and of course, fireworks abound.
sentences.chinese: 免费的酒水，节日狂欢者，当然还有礼花燃放。

sentences.english: Revelers pay as much as 6 pounds in a city center nightclub.
sentences.chinese: 而狂欢者在城市中心的夜总会要支付6英镑。

sentences.english: It is still the "square " of all living creatures carnival and origin of life .
sentences.chinese: 它还是“众神狂欢”的“广场”，是生命之源。

sentences.english: Carnival of Carnivals will bring together examples of carnivals from interested towns.
sentences.chinese: 狂欢节的展品可以提供给其他感兴趣的城市模范作用。

definition: (loanword) party (social gathering)/(Tw) party (typically associated with sex and drugs)
to step into the new year/New Year
